official_title: A bill entitled the "Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1987".
short_title: Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1987

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1987 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Battle Mountain Community Pasture, Lander County, Nevada, to the Pershing County Water Conservation District, subject to certain restrictions.
